meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing alkaloids.
meanings.sent1: The alkaloidal properties of the plant make it useful in medicine.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the alkaloidal compounds found in the flower.
meanings.sent3: The alkaloidal nature of the herb gave the potion a bitter taste.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had an alkaloidal quality, piercing through the silence.
meanings.sent5: The alkaloidal scent of the flower filled the room with a strong aroma.

meanings.sent1: The alkaloidal taste of the fruit reminded him of bitter medicine.
meanings.sent2: The alkaloidal nature of the substance made it toxic to insects.
meanings.sent3: The alkaloidal color of the painting gave it a unique and vibrant look.
meanings.sent4: Her alkaloidal personality was sharp and intense, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The alkaloidal texture of the fabric felt rough and prickly against her skin.
